thread.title: Tier.Net Technologies, LLC (Tier.Net) Acquires US-based Clients from GateNode and GreenyHost Web Hosting
thread.title_full: Tier.Net Technologies, LLC (Tier.Net) Acquires US-based Clients from GateNode and GreenyHost Web Hosting

title: Tier.Net Technologies, LLC (Tier.Net) Acquires US-based Clients from GateNode and GreenyHost Web Hosting
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Tier.Net Technologies, LLC (Tier.Net) Acquires US-based Clients from GateNode and GreenyHost Web Hosting Tier.Net Technologies LLC has announced the acquisition of US-based clients from web hosting providers- GateNode and GreenyHost for an undisclosed amount. With this acquisition, Tier.Net continues growth strategy and extends its customer base. MELBOURNE, FL, September 25, 2015 /24-7PressRelease/ -- Tier.Net Technologies, LLC (http://www.tier.net) announced that it has acquired US-based clients from GateNode and GreenyHost for an undisclosed amount. GateNode and GreenyHost are web hosting providers specializing in Shared Hosting, VPS Hosting and Dedicated Servers in US and European locations. With this acquisition, Tier.Net further extends its customer base and reinforces its commitment to rock solid hosting, data server, and colocation services. In addition, the newly acquired customers will benefit from the availability of many of Tier.Net's enhanced services not currently offered by GateNode and GreenyHost. No financial details of the deal were offered. However, John Dundon, Tier.Net's Managing Partner, mentioned that the newly acquired clients will not see any significant changes to pricing, networking, or the infrastructure as GateNode and GreenyHost were already hosted on Tier.Net's equipment and network. Dundon further added, "This acquisition fits perfectly into our strategy to increase our customer base. We welcome the new clients and look forward to giving them top-tier hosting and services backed by industry leading support." Tier.net owns its own hardware, network equipment, and boasts an in-house staff available 24/7/365 for assistance. Tier.Net is a fast growing leader in Business Hosting, VPS Hosting, Dedicated Server Hosting, Co-location, and Cloud services, focusing on the small to medium enterprise segment. For more information, visit http://www.tier.net.About Tier.Net Technologies LLC Established in 2013, Tier.Net has made a name for itself by offering quality web hosting solutions. Tier.Net offers Business Web Hosting, Reseller Hosting, VPS Hosting, Dedicated Servers, and Domain Registration at competitive prices in the market. Its unparalleled support makes it exemplary for clients searching for a solid web hosting provider for their personal and business sites. # # #
